entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12.

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
